name: Biltong Bites
title: Biltong Bites co
description: At Biltong Bites, we’re passionate about crafting premium, tender biltong made with care from start to finish. We hand-make all our biltong using carefully sourced meat from animals raised with less stress—resulting in a naturally more tender and less acidic product. The result? A flavor-packed snack that’s high in protein, low in additives, and full of goodness. Whether you’re after a quick bite or a wholesome treat, Biltong Bites delivers quality you can taste.
